addressDetails: 7 Yen The, Dien Bien, Ba Dinh, Ha Noi
aboutParagraph1: Xuan Hoa Home is a renowned manufacturer and retailer known for its high-quality and stylish home appliances and decor offerings. With a focus on craftsmanship and design, Xuan Hoa Home creates pieces that are both functional and aesthetically pleasing.
aboutParagraph2: The company offers a wide range of products options for various living spaces, including living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, and outdoor areas. Our collection includes windows blinds, windows and doors, tables and chairs, wooden tiles, and more. Each piece is meticulously crafted using quality materials to ensure durability and longevity.
aboutParagraph3: Xuan Hoa Home takes pride in its attention to detail and commitment to delivering products that meets the needs and preferences of its customers. The designs are often a blend of modern and traditional elements, allowing customers to find products that suits our personal style.
aboutParagraph4: In addition to our standard collection, Xuan Hoa Home also provides customization options, allowing customers to personalize our products to fit our specific requirements. This includes selecting different fabrics, finishes, and dimensions to create a truly unique piece.
aboutParagraph5: The company maintains a strong focus on sustainability and environmental responsibility. We strive to use eco-friendly materials and manufacturing processes, minimizing our impact on the environment.
aboutParagraph6: With a network of showrooms and retail partners, Xuan Hoa Home makes its products accessible to customers across various locations. Whether you're furnishing a new home or looking to upgrade your existing home, Xuan Hoa Home offers a wide selection of high-quality options to choose from.
contactParagraph: Feel free to contact us with a project proposal, quote or estimation, or simply to say hello. Hereâ€™s our contact info.
paragraphFooter: At our furniture brand, we believe that home is not just a place, but a reflection of who you are. That's why we strive to bring you exquisite furniture pieces that elevate your living spaces to new heights. With our commitment to quality craftsmanship and timeless designs, we invite you to discover the true essence of home and create a sanctuary that resonates with your unique style.
popUpText: Your Message is sent. Thanks For contacting us!

bonusParagraph: Xuan Hoa Home - a prestigious furniture brand in Vietnam with 50 years of experience, is always committed to bringing customers quality products at the best price.
